name: Jesper Seip
title: Junior Developer
profile_and_goal: Junior developer in education with a background in economics and film production. Former cinematographer at the beginning of a new journey as a full-stack developer. Eternal optimist and always eager to learn something new. My goal is to grow together with other knowledgeable, kind, and open-minded people.

experience.description: Former RO3-certified. Experience with close-range flying and BVLOS operations with support from the Civil Aviation Authority.
Management and operation of a small film production company. Coordination and execution of film projects.
Experience in service, teamwork, and handling high-pressure situations.

education.description: Focus on programming, user-friendly system development, and agile methodologies.
Basic introduction to financial management, marketing, and leadership.
Completed advanced mathematics and physics for admission to computer science studies.

education.institution: Nordland College of Art and Film
